landing.description1: Legend of Dante is a game with a fundamental role-playing and fantasy component based on Dante's divine comedy with some features of the Texas Hold'em game.
landing.description2: In this strategy card game, skill defines your success, not luck. Choose an iconic hero and combine it with demons, deities, pets, and runes to win the match.
landing.description3: Players face off in fast-paced duels that combine spell casting and magical abilities with the art of bluffing to fool their opponents.
landing.whoWillYouTake: Who Will You Take into the Fight?
landing.uniqueCards: Up to 52 Unique Cards That Will Surprise You
landing.upgradeYourStats: Upgrade Your Stats, Attributes, and Unlock New Features by Reaching the Hero Levels. The player will be able to shape their heroes, making them unique and preparing them to compete.
